      • decodeTlv

        public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> decodeTlv(java.lang.String tlv)
        Decode a hex string encoding TLV data to key-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        tlv - A set of data in hex string encoding TLV format to be converted.
        Returns:
        A dictionary of key-value pairs. The key corresponding to the Tag. The value corresponding to the Value.

      • encodeTlv

        public static java.lang.String encodeTlv(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> data)
        Constructed a hex string encoding TLV data from the set of data.
        Parameters:
        data - A set of data to be converted.
        Returns:
        A hex string encoding TLV data.

      • detectCardInteraction

        public void detectCardInteraction(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> data)
        Checks if a card has been swiped, inserted or tapped. The result is returned by the onCardInteractionDetected(CheckCardResult, Hashtable) callback. To cancel the check card process, call abortDetection() at onCardInteractionDetecting(CheckCardMode).

        Callback : onCardInteractionDetecting(CheckCardMode), onCardInteractionDetected(CheckCardResult, Hashtable),

        Parameters:
        data - Hashtable.

      • abortDetection

        public void abortDetection()
        abort the card detection process.
        Should call at BaseCardController.BaseCardDelegate.onCardInteractionDetecting(BaseCardController.CheckCardMode)

      • isICCInserted

        public boolean isICCInserted()
        retrieve current ICC insert status.
        Returns:
        true/false;
